svg.text:
CI Interpretation for Ship/No-Ship Decisions:
Case 1: Clear Winner (Ship!) 0% │ ├───────[●]───────┤ CI entirely above 0 │ Decision: Ship with high confidence ────────────────────────────────────────────
Case 2: Clear Loser (Don't Ship!) 0% │ ├───────[●]───────┤ CI entirely below 0 │ Decision: Don't ship, treatment is worse ────────────────────────────────────────────
Case 3: Inconclusive (Need More Data) 0% │ ├───────[●]───────┤ CI crosses 0 │ Decision: Not enough evidence, run longer or accept uncertainty ────────────────────────────────────────────
Case 4: Practically Significant (Ship!) 0% MDE │ │ ├───────[●]─────┼───┤ CI entirely above MDE │ │ Decision: Ship with confidence of meaningful impact
